titleStmt.title: Two treatises, the first of blood-letting and the diseases to be cured thereby, the second of cupping and scarifying, and the diseases to be cured thereby by Nich. Culpeper, Gent., M. Ruland, and Abdiah Cole ...
titleStmt.author: Culpeper, Nicholas, 1616-1654.
Ruland, Martin, 1532-1602.
Cole, Abdiah, ca. 1610-ca. 1670.
